alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 8:11PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Prairie and southwestern Dawson Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 810 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles west of Terry, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glendive, West Glendive, Lindsay, Hoyt, Forest Park, Marsh and Mccloud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
